name: Jive Turkey Shoot
description:
The goal is simple: shoot the turkey and try to get as many points as possible.

• You get 150 points for each turkey
• 75 points for each corn cob, pumpkin, or sweet potato
• Shooting a bottle makes you dizzy
• Shooting the shotgun shell gives you more ammo
• Shooting the kitchen timer gives you more time.

The game ends when you run out of ammo or time, or if you accidentally shoot the skull.
